title: Board login not processing
body: I cannot change the email on my account or look at the protection part. I was also just booted out of lobby and given a leaver buster notice but both my husband and I were sitting in the same lobby with an error message "Error report sent. Unable to log you in."

replies.body:
We're aware of a service incident that occurred last night shortly after 9:00pm PDT. It was resolved later in the evening before our scheduled live maintenance began. Any disconnects after we identified the issue should have been pardoned by loss prevention. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
